newsitem.title: ROMANIA: Romanian leu 3,261 to dollar for Sept 30 - BNR.
newsitem.headline: Romanian leu 3,261 to dollar for Sept 30 - BNR.

text.p: Romania's National Bank (BNR) announced the leu's reference rate at 3,261 to the dollar for September 30.
This reference rate was set on Thursday as a weighted average based on daily reports of foreign exchange operators. It is a guidance rate used for statistical accounting purposes.
The leu's reference rate set on Wednesday for September 27 to 29 is 3,247 to the dollar. It was 3,246 on Thursday.
